pullrequest.title: simbody contact manager integration for issue #865

content.raw: We actually already have a test that sends pose update messages. I'm currently adding that to one of the contact sensors tests (since the contact sensors subscribe to contact information, I think that will be similar enough to contact visualization to reproduce the failure).
content.html: We actually already have a test that sends pose update messages. I'm currently adding that to one of the contact sensors tests (since the contact sensors subscribe to contact information, I think that will be similar enough to contact visualization to reproduce the failure).
